snippet.title: Mika and the Witch's Mountain - Nintendo Switch Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Mika and the Witch’s Mountain is a fantasy adventure about an aspiring witch who delivers packages to the townspeople of a small island. Explore every cranny and soar through the sky with your magic broom.

Inspired by Kiki's Delivery Service and The Legend of Zelda: Wind Waker, it's now available for Nintendo Switch and Steam!

Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1819460/Mika_and_The_Witchs_Mountain/
Get it on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/mika-and-the-witchs-mountain-switch/
